title: Episode 80 - Lidia Bastianich
itunes:title: Episode 80 - Lidia Bastianich
description: The legendary Lidia Bastianich stops by with her new Book - A Pot, A Pan and A Bowl and we grab a quick bite with the angelic Morgan James whose new album 'A Very Magnetic Christmas' is out now.
content:encoded: The legendary Lidia Bastianich stops by with her new Book - A Pot, A Pan and A Bowl and we grab a quick bite with the angelic Morgan James whose new album 'A Very Magnetic Christmas' is out now.
itunes:author: All Things Comedy
